title: Appodeal React-Native integration for android (+example)
author: drakmail
content: readme.md react native appodeal example (android)example integration appodeal sdk react-native (based nulleof modified package: https://github.com/drakmail/react-native-appodeal)// more app.jsappodeal.settesting(true)appodeal.disablenetwork('inmobi')appodeal.init('6ed531b0a72a393f6a68e36c31200eaf1cf45dd1497bedfb')appodeal.setage(18)// appodeal.setbirthday('17/06/1990')appodeal.setemail('spam@youmeapp.ru')appodeal.setinterests('testing, react-native, android')appodeal.setrelation('dating') // dating / engaged / married / searching / single / appodeal.setgender('female') // female / male / appodeal.setalcohol('positive') // positive / negative / neutralappodeal.setsmoking('positive') // positive / negative / neutral to rungit clone https://github.com/drakmail/react-native-appodeal-example.gitinstall dependencies yarn installrun android version: yarn run androidstep step integration instructions you to integrate appodeal you react-native android application need do following steps:add react-native-appodeal could my fork react-native-appodeal, compiles running android. run yarn add https://github.com/drakmail/react-native-appodeal.gitlink dependenciesreact-native link react-native-appodealtune build.gradleopen android/app/build.gradle add somewhere android section:dexoptions { jumbomode = true javamaxheapsize "2g"} enable multidex option adding following line inside defaultconfig section:multidexenabled trueandroidmanifest.xmlaccording appodeal documentation, need add following tags your android/app/src/main/androidmanifest.xml file:inside <manifest> tag:<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.access_network_state" /><uses-permission android:name="android.permission.access_coarse_location" /><uses-permission android:name="android.permission.write_external_storage" />inside <application> tag:<meta-data android:name="com.appodeal.framework" android:value="android" /><receiver android:name="com.appodeal.ads.appodealpackageaddedreceiver" android:exported="true" android:enabled="true"><intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.package_added" /> <data android:scheme="package" /></intent-filter></receiver><activity android:name="com.appodeal.ads.interstitialactivity" android:configchanges="orientation|screensize" android:theme="@android:style/theme.translucent.notitlebar" /><activity android:name="com.appodeal.ads.videoactivity" import package:import appodeal 'react-native-appodeal'initialize :appodeal.settesting(true) // you to setup testing modeappodeal.init(your_appodeal_api_key) // api key that could show banners:appodeal.showbannerbottom() more implemented methods the app.js file this repo.contributing contributing this repository, please discuss change wish make via issue,email, any method the owners this repository before making change.please note have code conduct, please follow in your interactions the project.pull request processensure install build dependencies are removed before end the
